module.name: experiment-1
module.description: An example on how to run the superquadric modeling and grasping demo.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long:
This module provides a wrapper code for performing the superquadric modeling and grasping demo. A tutorial on how to use the module is provided here: tutorial.
This page illustrates the main parameters of the module (Section Parameters), the available ports and services.

param.desc: The name of the object to be modeled and grasped.
Select the hand for which we want to compute a grasping pose. Available values: right, left, both.
Select the hand for which we want to use for executing the grasping. Available values: right, left.

input.description: Receive the image from the left camera for saving the colored point cloud.

client.description: Ask for the 2D blob of the object.
Ask for the 2D bounding box of the object.
Ask for the 3D point cloud of the object.
